programme.title: Kings Of Pain (S2)
programme.desc: Adam has a phobia of tarantulas, so naturally Caveman Rob picks two of the world's nastiest ones for them to endure, including a tarantula with the well-deserved nickname "Orange Bitey Thing."

programme.title: History's Greatest Heists With Pierce Brosnan (S1)
programme.desc: An armoured car depot employee uses his insider knowledge to plan a heist that could net him, and the friends he recruits, more than $18 million in cash.

programme.title: Alone (S9)
programme.desc: As hunger rapidly sets in, the participants find themselves in a time crunch to explore their surroundings. While some are able to provide, others face the emotional and physical toll of their decisions.

programme.title: Forged In Fire (S8)
programme.desc: In this competition, the judges flip the script once again, letting the bladesmiths choose their challenge. Will they take it easy or go big to impress the judges?

programme.title: The Toys That Built The World (S2)
programme.desc: In the 1980s, groundbreaking technology doesn't just improve adult life, it redefines classic toys. Childhood staples are reimagined by innovators pushing the boundaries of entertainment technology.

programme.title: Pawn Stars (S23)
programme.desc: When a seller comes in with an overcoat once owned by suspected JFK assassin Lee Harvey Oswald, will the deal be a stroll on a grassy knoll or will Rick lose his shot at owning a piece of history?

programme.title: History's Greatest Of All Time With Peyton Manning (S1)
programme.desc: From GI Joe to the Slinky, host Peyton Manning counts down the top ten toys of all time, as voted by a panel of experts. Which one of your childhood favourites will be crowned the best of the best?

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries (S3)
programme.desc: As the Cold War ramps up, a well-dressed man is found dead within miles of a nuclear testing site on a tranquil Australian beach. There are no clues to his identity, or what could have happened.

programme.title: Ride n' Seek Philippines With Jaime Dempsey (S1)
programme.desc: The Batangas region of the Philippines is famous for its butterfly-knife makers and wielders. Jaime learns a few tricks as she passes through but when she comes under unexpected attack, will they work?

programme.title: Ride n' Seek Philippines With Jaime Dempsey (S1)
programme.desc: Jaime's chance encounter with a boar owner gets her front-row tickets to watch pigs mating on a farm.

programme.desc: Rick, Corey and Chum are ending their road trip in the Old Man's hometown of Winston-Salem. Surrounded by a bevy of experts, the guys are hoping to make some sweet Carolina deals.

programme.title: Saudin: The Orangutan Whisperer
programme.desc: Saudin: The Orangutan Whisperer, is based on a true story of Saudin Bin Labutau. In 1936, Saudin became the first descendent of a Murut headhunter to travel to New York.

programme.title: Ride n' Seek Philippines With Jaime Dempsey (S1)
programme.desc: En route through Isabela province, Jaime is persuaded to trade her bike for a racing buffalo. Unfortunately, the buffalo isn't keen to be ridden and makes its displeasure known.

programme.title: Ride n' Seek Philippines With Jaime Dempsey (S1)
programme.desc: Jaime ditches her bike and takes the journey's final leg on foot – a climb up mountains to meet the legendary tattoo artist Fang Od. The tattoo itself is a painful process in primitive conditions.

programme.title: The Pickers (S18)
programme.desc: While Robbie crosses the Rockies with a legendary car in tow, Mike and Mefford go for a high-speed joyride in a banned badass muscle car without brakes.

programme.desc: Rick and Chum get a relatively genius package containing letters signed by Albert Einstein, but can they figure out the equation to work out a deal?

programme.title: The Pickers (S16)
programme.desc: Mike looks to add to the collection when he tries to make a deal on vintage cars and bicycles.

programme.title: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? IV
programme.desc: Bell and Ryu barely escape death with their unyielding will, justice, and luck brought about by their inexhaustible survival instincts. The two take a breather in an unexplored area they chanced upon in the basement of the collapsed Colosseum. After overcoming the ordeal, the two exchange exhausted smiles and begin on their path toward the surface. They believe that a bright future awaits them in this dark abyss.

programme.title: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? IV
programme.desc: The boy sets out to battle alone, hoping the dear elf can have a peaceful slumber. What awaits the boy is the calamity itself - Juggernaut. The evil being that robbed the elf of everything is their last obstacle blocking them from reaching the surface. Utilizing whatever he learned from the elf in the abyss, the boy faces off against Juggernaut - to return home alive and not lose anything dear to him. The Deep Chapter: Calamity Arc comes to a close.

programme.title: ARIFURETA: From Commonplace to World's Strongest
programme.desc: After being summoned to another world, Hajime Nagumo desperately tries to survive. However, he has zero combat abilities as a Synergist, resulting in lethal wounds from monsters.

programme.title: ARIFURETA: From Commonplace to World's Strongest
programme.desc: Hajime comes across a door that's guarded by a pair of cyclops. He defeats them easily, but what will he find sealed beyond those doors?

programme.title: Skip and Loafer
programme.desc: Mitsumi volunteers to be the class representative and goes to karaoke for the first time.

programme.title: Skip and Loafer
programme.desc: Rumours about Mitsumi being a "shadow boss" begin to spread…

programme.title: THE PROMISED NEVERLAND
programme.desc: Emma and Ray were pretending to have given up on the escape when they'd still been planning it out all along. Ray suggests a plan that would take place on the night before his shipment.

programme.title: THE PROMISED NEVERLAND
programme.desc: Emma promises to return for the children under the age of five. Isabella tries to stop the escape, but ends up letting them go. On the other side, the morning sun shines…

programme.desc: Bocchan finally meets the witch who cursed him—Tsade. Alice's mother, Sharon, awakens from her eternal slumber. The story between Bocchan and Alice finally reaches a conclusion...!

programme.title: PUELLA MAGI MADOKA MAGICA SIDE STORY [MAGIA RECORD]
programme.desc: Turning down the invitation by the Wings of Magius, Iroha regroups with Yachiyo. But Yachiyo, convinced that her wish has harmed those around her, announces the disbandment of the team.

programme.desc: Emma promises to return for the children under the age of five. Isabella tries to stop the escape, but ends up letting them go. On the other side, the morning sun shines…

programme.title: The Demon Prince of Momochi House
programme.desc: Himari receives a will from her parents to inherit the Momochi House as she turns 16. There, she meets Aoi, Yukari and Ise, and is told to leave as Aoi is the master of the Momochi House…!

programme.title: The Demon Prince of Momochi House
programme.desc: Himari starts living in the Momochi House. She tries to find out about her parents and questions Aoi, but to no avail. One day, Himari finds cherry blossom petals falling within the house.

programme.title: The Demon Prince of Momochi House
programme.desc: Himari starts attending school and she meets new friends. She decides to bring them to the Momochi House, and seeks Aoi and others' cooperation. However, Aoi brings her a shocking news…

programme.title: The Demon Prince of Momochi House
programme.desc: After encountering Kasha, Aoi and the others must redo the seal on Momochi House. Himari sees a certain mark, as Nue falls into Kasha's trap. To save Nue, Ise reveals his true form…

programme.title: The Demon Prince of Momochi House
programme.desc: Himari hears rumors about her classmate, Hidaka. Himari visits his house and meets a child with a fox mask who warns her to stay away. She tells Aoi, who seems to know something.

programme.title: The Demon Prince of Momochi House
programme.desc: Aoi is asked to purify a polluted spring. Yukari tries to communicate with the Dragon God, the source of the spring water, but fails. While investigating at the spring, Yukari collapses…

programme.title: The Demon Prince of Momochi House
programme.desc: Unable to focus on class, Himari is asked by Nachi-sensei to clean the Literature Prep Room. There, she finds the "Peeping Mirror" that looks into the thing every person wants to know…

programme.title: The Demon Prince of Momochi House
programme.desc: Himari decides to confess to Aoi, but Aoi is in a slump, causing an influx of demons in Momochi House. Grand Catmother visits and suggests matchmaking for Aoi while Himari tries to stop it.

programme.title: The Demon Prince of Momochi House
programme.desc: Himari decides to confess to Aoi, but Aoi is in a slump, causing an influx of demons in Momochi House. Grand Catmother visits and suggests matchmaking for Aoi while Himari tries to stop it.

programme.title: The Demon Prince of Momochi House
programme.desc: Himari and her classmates visit Kagome Park, which is said to be haunted. They hear an eerie wind and singing voice, but it turns out to be Seno. On her way home, Himari hears it again…

programme.title: The Demon Prince of Momochi House
programme.desc: Nachi-sensei, who suddenly appeared at Momochi House, seems to know Aoi. Aoi fails to transform into Nue. What exactly happened between Aoi and Nachi? Their past is about to be revealed.

programme.title: The Demon Prince of Momochi House
programme.desc: Himari chooses Aoi's shelf, learns about Aoi's past and steels her resolve to save Aoi and her family in Momochi House. What will become of the showdown with Nachi…?

programme.title: The Demon Prince of Momochi House
programme.desc: While preparing for a party to celebrate everyone's hard work, Aoi talks to Himari about the Shelves of Recollection and reveals a secret he has been keeping.

programme.title: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? IV
programme.desc: Bell and Ryu barely escape death with their unyielding will, justice, and luck brought about by their inexhaustible survival instincts. The two take a breather in an unexplored area they chanced upon in the basement of the collapsed Colosseum. After overcoming the ordeal, the two exchange exhausted smiles and begin on their path toward the surface. They believe that a bright future awaits them in this dark abyss.

programme.title: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? IV
programme.desc: The boy sets out to battle alone, hoping the dear elf can have a peaceful slumber. What awaits the boy is the calamity itself - Juggernaut. The evil being that robbed the elf of everything is their last obstacle blocking them from reaching the surface. Utilizing whatever he learned from the elf in the abyss, the boy faces off against Juggernaut - to return home alive and not lose anything dear to him. The Deep Chapter: Calamity Arc comes to a close.

programme.title: ARIFURETA: From Commonplace to World's Strongest
programme.desc: After being summoned to another world, Hajime Nagumo desperately tries to survive. However, he has zero combat abilities as a Synergist, resulting in lethal wounds from monsters.

programme.title: ARIFURETA: From Commonplace to World's Strongest
programme.desc: Hajime comes across a door that's guarded by a pair of cyclops. He defeats them easily, but what will he find sealed beyond those doors?

programme.title: Skip and Loafer
programme.desc: Mitsumi volunteers to be the class representative and goes to karaoke for the first time.

programme.title: Skip and Loafer

programme.desc: The spies seek out proof of emotions in the animals and fish they interact with. Spy dolphin tries to keep up with real dolphins as they play in the surf; spy sperm whale sees a calf's mother's loving bond; spy cuttlefish discovers that male cuttlefish can be very jealous.

programme.title: Dynasties: Making Of (S1)
programme.desc: Every animal is on an extraordinary journey through life with one goal: To produce the next generation - life's great story. This is a diarised account of the making of the natural history series Dynasties.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather (S3)
programme.desc: A record-breaking cyclone wrecks South Pacific islands, a cruise ship becomes stranded in a storm, and two friends get caught in a deadly avalanche.

programme.title: The Mating Game (S1)
programme.desc: Jungles are home to 80% of all species but they cover just 2% of the planet. When animals in these crowded forests want to mate, the challenge is how to stand out from the crowd.

programme.title: Iceland with Alexander Armstrong (S1)
programme.desc: Alexander Armstrong continues his journey around Iceland with a visit to a glacier, a trip to the island of Heimay which was nearly destroyed by a volcanic eruption in the 1970s, a walk on the most dangerous beach in the country and a night in a capsule hotel.

programme.title: Tribal Bootcamp (S2)
programme.desc: Joel and Nish spend a week in the tough, no-nonsense world of the Argentinian Gauchos, learning how to ride horse and herd cattle across the South American Pampas.

programme.desc: This contemporary and unfiltered series offers fascinating insights into the most successful animal group ever, from the tiny Etruscan shrew to the giant blue whale.

programme.title: Food Factory (S5)

programme.title: Food Factory (S5)
programme.desc: 1.8 million cherry chews are produced from just one single batch; massive silos of wheat are transformed into 'elbow' macaroni pasta; a continental cranberry cheesecake first started as a Christmas experiment; and meet chakri, the exotic southeast Asian snack that's hand-twirled and fried to crispy perfection.

programme.title: Grand Designs: House Of The Year S6 - EP 4
programme.desc: Join Kevin McCloud, Michelle Ogundehin and Damion Burrows for an exclusive look at the extraordinary new homes competing for the 2021 RIBA House of the Year award. Over four one-hour specials, we explore the inspiration and stories behind these builds. Categories include houses that take us by surprise, homes that reinvent a popular style, problem-solving homes and homes that showcase exceptional materials and craftsmanship.

programme.title: Mat Yoyo: The New Generation - EP 10
programme.desc: Kim shows Yoyo and Yaya how much fun learning about numbers can be by playing a game of Calculator Hopscotch. Why segment - Why are numbers important? Kim, Yoyo and Yaya find out the different ways numbers impact our lives. They explore how to measure the height and weight of various objects.

programme.title: In Our House S2 - EP 5
programme.desc: IN OUR HOUSE is full of surprises and is more interactive and energetic than you have ever seen before. In an entertaining mix of song, dance, music and drama, join the wacky hosts as they introduce the LETTERS AND NUMBERS OF THE DAY and the adventures that they encounter.

programme.title: The Big Q S3 - EP 11
programme.desc: The Big Q S3 - EP 11

programme.title: Super Rover & Friends - EP 20
programme.desc: Super Rover and Jinxy help solve the mystery of the Robot that refused to move. Meanwhile, Max learns how to have fun when his arms are in a cast.

programme.title: Tayo The Little Bus S1 - EP 7
programme.desc: The adventures of Tayo, a blue bus with the number 120. He is very playful and mischievous with his passengers and his friends.

programme.title: Tayo The Little Bus S1 - EP 8
programme.desc: The adventures of Tayo, a blue bus with the number 120. He is very playful and mischievous with his passengers and his friends.

programme.title: Pinkfong Songs & Stories - EP 81
programme.desc: Enjoy the best of Pinkfong's most loved songs and stories with all your favourite characters!

programme.title: Minibods - EP 33
programme.desc: Lulu learns about a magical Snowhoof and goes on an exciting adventure to find out if it is real.

programme.title: Minibods - EP 35
programme.desc: Bubbles discovers the magic behind Pogo's tricks and learns that some things are best kept secret.

programme.title: The Great Warrior Wall - EP 27
programme.desc: This exciting series follows the life of Seya Wolf on his quest to become a hero. On his way, he encounters friends that accompany him on his journey, and foes who force him into battles.

programme.title: Pokemon Ultimate Journeys: The Series S25 - EP 40
programme.desc: The stakes are higher than ever for Ash, Goh, and Chloe as they advance toward their goals! As the Pokemon World Coronation Series tournament heats up, intensive training is in store for Ash, Pikachu, and their Pokemon friends.

programme.title: My Buddy Bonemasher - EP 8
programme.desc: Iz's wrestling idol, Teddy Bear is holding an autograph signing session after school. But a surprise mock test is announced meaning Iz won't make it there in time. With encouragement from Bonemasher, Iz decides to sneak out from the test so he can get there in time.

programme.title: Power Rangers Dino Fury S29 - EP 21
programme.desc: When an army of powerful alien beings are unleashed on Earth, threatening life as we know it, a brand-new team of Power Rangers, fueled by the pre-historic power of the dinosaurs, are recruited to deal with the threat.

programme.title: Inazuma Eleven Ares - EP 16
programme.desc: When an elite group of soccer players split up to join teams across the country, the group's forward joins an underdog team from a remote island to help it achieve victory in a youth tournament.

programme.title: Ultraman Z - EP 10
programme.desc: Ultraman Z, the newest addition to the Intergalactic Defense Force, battles with evil forces that spread across the universe. He goes after the monster Genegarg to save Earth from destruction.

programme.title: Rise Of The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S2 - EP 6
programme.desc: Four mutant turtle brothers go on adventures where they end up tapping into mystic ninja powers.

programme.title: Danger Mouse S1 - EP 47
programme.desc: The continuing adventures of secret agent Danger Mouse and his sidekick Penfold.

programme.title: The Deep S2 - EP 10
programme.desc: The series follows the Nekton family, a family of adventurous underwater explorers who live aboard a state-of-the-art submarine, the Aronnax, and explore unknown areas of the Earth's oceans to unravel the mysteries of the depths.

programme.title: Miniforce X[S2]- EP 15
programme.desc: (Dual Language - English and Mandarin) The Miniforce fight against Villains threatening the Earth! Our heroes Volt, Max, Sammy and Lucy come back with upgraded X-power!

programme.title: Groom My Room - EP 11
programme.desc: Anjali's finally getting a new room after enduring sleepless nights of sharing a bedroom with her brother who likes to read late into the night. Her dream of garden themed room is a streach on the budget as Anjali has to squeeze several big items furniture and accessories all within $500! Will she be able to find everything she needs? If shopping was a strech on the budget the makeover was another test of stamina and resilience.

programme.title: HSBC SVNS Singapore 2024
programme.desc: The two-day event will feature a star-studded line-up with teams from Argentina, Australia, Canada, Great Britain, Fiji, France, Hong Kong, Ireland, New Zealand, Samoa, South Africa, Spain, Uruguay and USA. They will battle it out at the Singapore National Stadium to gain ranking points for their climb up the table.

programme.title: Mobil 1 The Grid 2024 - EP 3
programme.desc: Offering a behind the scenes VIP pass to the world of motorsport, Mobil 1 The Grid delivers the most comprehensive coverage of 4 wheel racing on television. The series will focus on all the great race series along with unprecedented access to some of the sport's biggest teams and drivers.

programme.title: Survivor 46 - EP 7
programme.desc: 18 new castaways battle it out on the islands of Fiji for a million dollars and the title of Sole Survivor.

programme.title: Unbelievable Moments Caught On Camera S5 - EP 4
programme.desc: Voiced by Alexander Armstrong, the programme travels around the globe - meeting the people who filmed these amazing clips to get the stories behind the footage. Unbelievable Moments Caught on Camera features incredible, eye-witness footage shot by members of the public.

programme.title: Films & Stars - EP 855
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: Planet Action S3 - EP 7
programme.desc: Planet Action is a fast-paced 25min evergreen series that brings you right to the edge of your seat. From cowboy shoot-outs, to exploding cars, extraordinary stunt scenes, fights in space, and roaring monsters. We'll take you behind the scenes of the best action movies released.

programme.title: The Three Musketeers
programme.desc: The hot-headed young D'Artagnan along with three former legendary but now down on their luck Musketeers must unite and defeat a beautiful double agent and her villainous employer from seizing the French throne and engulfing Europe in war.

programme.title: News Tonight - EP 41
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: Interview with Lee Hsien Loong - Two Decades as Prime Minister - EP 2
programme.desc: After 2 decades in office, Mr Lee Hsien Loong sits down for one last interview as Prime Minister of Singapore, reflecting on policies, his stewardship, the challenges faced, and his plans post-handover.

programme.title: Brahms: The Boy II
programme.desc: The story is about a family moves to a house in a countryside after a son (Jude) and mother (Liza) both traumatised from an unexpected burglary. Jude finds a dirty, dusty porcelain doll and calls it Brahms. Everything then change in a sinister way because of the doll.

programme.title: Leverage: Redemption S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: While staging a date-night experience for Parker & Hardison at an ultra-secure freeport facility, the team comes across another heist in progress and must stop it to save the life of a 13-year-old boy.

programme.title: The Good Karma Hospital S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: The full moon spells trouble when a mystery Adonis washes up on the shore. And as the team race against the clock to treat a local snake catcher whose luck may finally have run out, tensions mount when new girl Ruby questions Gabriel's professional conduct.

programme.title: America's Got Talent: Extreme - EP 2
programme.desc: America's Got Talent: Extreme is an American reality television and talent competition series created by Simon Cowell. The series is a spinoff of America's Got Talent that focuses on stunt performers. Showcasing the most outrageous, unique and jaw-dropping acts of enormous scale and magnitude that simply can't be confined to a theater stage.

programme.title: Unbelievable Moments Caught On Camera S5 - EP 4
programme.desc: Voiced by Alexander Armstrong, the programme travels around the globe - meeting the people who filmed these amazing clips to get the stories behind the footage. Unbelievable Moments Caught on Camera features incredible, eye-witness footage shot by members of the public.

programme.title: The $100,000 Pyramid S6 - EP 4
programme.desc: Two teams of two compete in a word-association game. Each contestant gets a celebrity partner, and one partner provides clues to the other about six mystery words, leaving the other to guess those words before the time runs out. The team with the most points gets to play in the winners circle, where the top prize is $100,000. Michael Strahan hosts.

programme.title: India Unplated S1 - EP 9
programme.desc: Today we make our way to central India. In this episode, Adam shares his famous Bhopali Lamb Korma followed by Sandeep's Bhutte ki Kees, a delicious corn porridge that is full of nutrition and flavour. The final recipe is Indrahar by Helly, a popular snack made with five different types of lentils.

Luo Shen feels that Chang Er's love for Hou Yi far exceeds hers and thus decides to back out of the love triangle...

programme.title: The Happiest Girl In The World
programme.desc: Delia, an 18-year-old girl from a small Romanian town learns that she has won a car in a contest, and she travels to Bucharest with her parents to claim it. All goes well, until Delia and her family starts to disagree on what to do with the car.

programme.title: East Of Sweden
programme.desc: Three men share a cabin on a night train – Dominick, an undocumented immigrant, Jere, a criminal and Aleksi, a psychiatric patient. By the night’s end, Aleksi is dead. The surviving two make a dangerous choice that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Polite People
programme.desc: A delightful comedy, Polite People is the story of a self-obsessed city dweller, so desperate to leave the city that he lies his way into a small farming community. Little does he know, he is unwittingly walking straight into a small-town political war.

programme.title: The Breach
programme.desc: A fatal car crash shudders a crisis-torn family. Completely lost and shaken to the core by his wife’s death, the husband undertakes his own investigation and learns the shattering truth about his spouse’s genuine woes and longings.

programme.title: Road To Your Heart
programme.desc: In this sweet road-trip movie, Basson, a young businessman journeys to Cape Town for his father’s funeral and to fulfill certain tasks in the will. He meets bohemian Amory along the way and they encounter hilarious moments, disappointments and heartaches.

programme.title: Murder in Haute Provence
programme.desc: Two police officers investigate a body found in a slaughterhouse with the label “Can they suffer”. Although an animal rights association was initially suspected, details reveal that the victim was an undercover cop specialising in veterinary surveillance.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: The Last Star Witness - Escape to the Alps
programme.desc: After accidentally killing a man she wrongly thought was about to attack her, a traumatised Sarah Kohr is sent away on leave to forget the ordeal. But when she witnesses a man being shot at the airport, she has to help his son flee from the unknown killer.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: After the death of their father and mother, four siblings reunite to come to terms with the tragedy. They decide to participate in a hunting challenge which will determine their inheritance.

programme.title: Commitment Asli
programme.desc: Asli is a young mother struggling to reconcile her commitments as a mother and wife with her professional career. She hires Gulnihal, a nanny and a fellow mother, but whose arrival forces Asli to confront the secrets she has been avoiding.

programme.title: Rival
programme.desc: 9-year-old Roman follows his mother Oksana, an illegal nurse in Germany. Oksana falls in love with 62-year-old Gert who tries to befriend Roman. While spending an afternoon alone with Roman, Gert suddenly dies of a heart attack, leaving Roman alone.

programme.title: My Little Sister
programme.desc: Set in Russia during WWII, little Yamil impatiently awaits the day that his father, whom he has never seen, can return home from battle. One day, mother brings home a traumatized orphan girl Oksana. Yamil finds comfort and hope in loving her as a sister.

programme.title: Verdict

programme.title: My Little Sister

programme.desc: After narrowly escaping from a lab technician who was found guilty of the murder of his lab assistant, Inspector Sarah Kohr has to track him down. But the killer is wanted by another assassin, linked to a scandal far greater than Sarah imagined.

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: Thomas has it all: family and career at its best. But when his company’s most lucrative deal ever is about to close, something goes terribly wrong. He is arrested for the murder of his business partner when his fingerprint is found on the murder weapon.

programme.title: The Etruscan Smile
programme.desc: Neil is a rugged and hostile Scotsman who enjoys solitary life. When he’s forced to seek medical treatment in America, he begrudgingly moves in with his son who tries to connect with him. Yet, it is his grandson who ultimately stirs his hardened heart.

programme.title: Mission Dadu
programme.desc: The film is about Chumki, an 11 year old girl who feels that the ultimate way of making her war-veteran grandfather happy is by creating a war.

programme.desc: When Giulio’s fiancée cheats on him right before their wedding, the newly singled Giulio decides to attend classes to win back his fiancée taught by Valeria, a beautiful and determined relationship coach disillusioned with love.

programme.title: Delicious Miss Brown (S8)
programme.desc: With staples from her pantry, Kardea Brown cooks up a meal with Grilled Country-Style Pork Ribs, Red Beans and Rice, and Grilled Cabbage Wedges with Buttermilk Ranch.

programme.title: Chef Boot Camp (S2)
programme.desc: Chef Cliff works with a second-time restaurant owner, a caterer with brick-and-mortar dreams and an owner who wants to be in multiple cities.

programme.desc: Big lumps of crabmeat are the secret to Rachael Ray's Carbonara with Crab.

programme.title: 30 Minute Meals (S28)

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins, And Dives (S35)
programme.desc: Guy Fieri's grabbing all kinds of funky flavor, starting in Laramie, WY, where a restaurant-bar is pilin' up their nachos.

programme.desc: Guy Fieri's diving into Asian flavors alongside a taste of Italy, starting at a Vietnamese spot in Albuquerque, NM, that's servin' up out-of-bounds banh mi.

programme.title: Delicious Miss Brown (S8)
programme.desc: Kardea Brown is cooking up a traditional Charleston meal with Low Country Pickled Shrimp Salad and Braised Oxtails served over Rice and Sea Island Red Peas.

programme.title: Delicious Miss Brown (S8)
programme.desc: Kardea Brown is planning the perfect meal to celebrate her brothers for Father's Day.She is frying up her Country Fried Steak with White Gravy over Kardea's Herby Grits.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Japan - Okinawa
programme.desc: Adam ends his taste tour through Japan with a trip to the island of Okinawa, where he discovers an eclectic cuisine and learns the secret to long life.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2 - Wine Country
programme.desc: Warren is in the Franschhoek Valley, exploring the endless bounty of Boschendal Wine Estate.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2 - Hidden Hermanus
programme.desc: Continuing to listen to his heart, Warren deepens his love of wine by venturing to the lesser known town of Hermanus, where he’ll visit Newton Johnson, the ‘wine farm with a view’.

programme.title: Million Dollar American Princesses S2 - Queens Of The Screen
programme.desc: Meet three actresses who became real-life princesses. Follow Grace Kelly, Gloria Swanson, and Rita Hayworth on their rise from Hollywood royalty to members of European nobility, which brought unparalleled glamour to the aristocracy.

programme.title: Million Dollar American Princesses S2 - Queens Of Culture
programme.desc: Meet the “Queens of Culture”: three empowered American princesses who blazed trails through the international arts world. See how Winnaretta Singer, Sara Murphy, and Peggy Guggenheim inspired some of the most innovative artists of the 20th century.

programme.title: Sports Detectives - 100-Point Game Ball
programme.desc: Wilt Chamberlain is the only NBA player to have scored a remarkable 100 points in a game. Investigate what happened to his 100-point ball. Then, examine a controversial Kentucky Derby trophy that may have been falsely identified.

programme.title: Sports Detectives - Ali's Missing Gold Medal
programme.desc: A young Muhammad Ali clinched Olympic gold in 1960, but returned home to the same bigotry he’d left behind. Disillusioned, it’s said that he threw his medal into the Ohio River. Head to Kentucky and uncover the real story behind this legendary tale.

programme.title: Reframed: Marilyn Monroe - Contender
programme.desc: This episode explores the young Norma Jeane. While showing talent and audacity, she turned her back on her difficult childhood and put herself on the radar in Hollywood as ‘Marilyn Monroe’.

programme.title: Reframed: Marilyn Monroe - Siren
programme.desc: This episode explores Marilyn’s defiance about posing nude and how it catapults her to stardom.

programme.title: Bornean Elephants
programme.desc: The documentary takes the perspective of Bornean elephants in Sabah as they traverse through the landscape and show how these gentle giants can coexist with humans amidst different challenges faced.

programme.title: Panama's Animal Highway
programme.desc: Scientists use state-of-the-art technology to battle the conservation dangers threatening the millions of animals that migrate through Panama.

programme.title: Alaska: A Year In The Wild - Winter
programme.desc: The end of winter heralds one of the world's greatest feeding frenzies as large ocean predators target the millions of fish who have found refuge in the Gulf of Alaska.

programme.title: Alaska: A Year In The Wild - Spring
programme.desc: With the arrival of spring, days grow longer and temperatures rise. However, spring in Alaska is short. Animals have just two months to find food and start a family, while avoiding predators.

programme.title: Alaska: A Year In The Wild - Summer
programme.desc: Summer has arrived in Alaska.This sets the scene for one of the world's greatest migrations of the Alaskan salmon run.

programme.title: Alaska: A Year In The Wild - Autumn
programme.desc: Humpback whales return to Alaska's rich feeding grounds and salmon return to spawn in the rivers. The returning salmon however have to negotiate a path past hungry brown bears.

programme.title: America's National Parks At 100
programme.desc: The National Park Service has been active for over a century preserving and protecting over 400 units across America, from the wild and natural to the man-made and historic. Take a tour through iconic Yellowstone and the Grand Canyon and discover smaller, hidden treasures throughout the country.

programme.title: The Mountain Lion And Me
programme.desc: Follow the lives of an elusive mountain lion and her three cubs in Paradise Valley, Montana. Get a rare glimpse into their lives and a deeper understanding of a previously unknown animal.

programme.title: Iberia's Woodlands - Breeding Season
programme.desc: Narrated by acclaimed English actor Bill Nighy, this blue-chip natural history series reveals the challenges faced by the astounding and rare creatures that make this unique environment their home.

programme.title: Iberia's Woodlands - Rivalry Time
programme.desc: Narrated by acclaimed English actor Bill Nighy, this blue-chip natural history series reveals the challenges faced by the astounding and rare creatures that make this unique environment their home.

programme.title: Impossible Animals - Deserts
programme.desc: Biologist Patrick Aryee introduces us to the incredible animals living in one of the world’s toughest places, deserts. With ground temperatures exceeding 70 degrees Celsius, to survive here creatures have developed some ingenious adaptations.

programme.title: Impossible Animals - Rainforests
programme.desc: Patrick Ayree introduces us to the Rainforest residents that have pushed their bodies to the limit, revealing some of the world’s most remarkable behaviours and adaptations.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP11
programme.desc: It’s always so intriguing to discover the roots of a culture. We track the history of African Americans around their fix-ins in gorgeous New Orleans.It’s always so intriguing to discover the roots of a culture. We track the history of African Americans around their fix-ins in gorgeous New Orleans.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP12
programme.desc: This moving trend is sweeping states and is taking the food to the people. We get on the bandwagon and taste the food.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP13
programme.desc: Lurking beneath the waters of the northwest is some of the best seafood in the country and in fact, the world. We meet the original custodians of the areas and we taste the food they helped them thrive in this region. Seattle’s seafood scene has grown into one of the best in the world.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP14
programme.desc: We kick off with a Greek restaurant that specialises in seafood. We go north up to Harlem to try a new eatery with a New York foodie and we try the delectable tastes of the world’s first fine-dining restaurant, all here in New York.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Japan - Kyoto
programme.desc: Adam meets a tea master, a Maiko, and a Michelin chef who turns risotto into sushi in the thriving traditional culture of Kyoto.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Japan - Osaka
programme.desc: Adam Liaw explores Japan's high-energy financial centre, Osaka, and finds the world's best fast food, a sumo wrestler turned chef, and soba noodles to die for.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Japan - Kyushu And Shikoku
programme.desc: In Japan's southern islands of Kyushu and Shikoku, Adam Liaw finds a vibrant, warm culture where the cuisine is as fascinating as its people.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Japan - Okinawa
programme.desc: Adam ends his taste tour through Japan with a trip to the island of Okinawa, where he discovers an eclectic cuisine and learns the secret to long life.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2 - Wine Country
programme.desc: Warren is in the Franschhoek Valley, exploring the endless bounty of Boschendal Wine Estate.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2 - Hidden Hermanus
programme.desc: Continuing to listen to his heart, Warren deepens his love of wine by venturing to the lesser known town of Hermanus, where he’ll visit Newton Johnson, the ‘wine farm with a view’.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2 - Wild Kwa-Zulu Natal
programme.desc: The wild northeast coast of South Africa is like nothing you’ve seen. And it’s here Warren will find himself romanced by empty beaches, rugged open oceans, and waterways filled with wild hippopotamus.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2 - Madikwe Safari
programme.desc: In this episode, Warren experiences the abundance of wildlife here, centering his experience around tracking and finding the elusive and endangered African Wild Dog.

programme.title: Carriers At War - Air Wing
programme.desc: The air wing is the carrier’s most powerful weapon, made up of more than 70 specialized and deadly aircraft. Follow the crew of the USS Truman as it heads into battle and learn how the air wing has evolved into a centrepiece of naval strategy.

programme.title: Carriers At War - U.S.S. Ford
programme.desc: It’s a $14-billion behemoth designed to meet the demands of 21st century warfare. Get unprecedented access to the state-of-the-art USS Gerald R. Ford, the most advanced warship ever built, and watch her 13-year journey from shipyard to sea.

programme.title: Air Warriors - F-15 Eagle
programme.desc: Meet the undisputed king of winged fighters, the F-15 Eagle. See how it revolutionized the aviation world through rare footage and captivating stories from the pilots who flew into danger aboard this remarkable and resilient aircraft.

programme.title: Air Warriors - F-15 Eagle
programme.desc: Meet the undisputed king of winged fighters, the F-15 Eagle. See how it revolutionized the aviation world through rare footage and captivating stories from the pilots who flew into danger aboard this remarkable and resilient aircraft.

programme.title: Air Warriors - Ah- 64 Apache
programme.desc: Discover the inside story of the world’s premier attack helicopter, from its controversial beginnings to its triumphs against enemy forces. Highly maneuverable and heavily armed, the AH-64 Apache is one of the most trusted weapons in the sky

programme.title: Secrets Of The Museum - EP3
programme.desc: Curators Steph and Jenny plan a major new exhibition celebrating the work of innovative British fashion designer Mary Quant who shook up women’s fashion in the 1960s with clothing that liberated women from decades of corsetry.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Museum - EP4
programme.desc: This week, we meet curators and conservators trying to preserve some of the finest examples of craftsmanship in the world.

programme.title: Edge Of Existence - Bio-Threats
programme.desc: Edge of Existence explores a future where bio-threats present one of the greatest existential risks that humanity has ever faced. From viruses to man-made pandemics and synthetic bio-weapons, technology is accelerating the risks of man-made threats.

programme.title: Edge Of Existence - Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: Edge of Existence explores a near-future where artificial intelligence rules the planet, and us. AI will arrive in our life-times bringing with it the biggest existential risk humanity has ever faced.

programme.title: The Dinosaur Echo
programme.desc: The Dinosaur Echo is a documentary about the renaissance of paleontology in Canada today and what dinosaurs can teach us about climate change.

programme.title: America's National Parks At 100
programme.desc: The National Park Service has been active for over a century preserving and protecting over 400 units across America, from the wild and natural to the man-made and historic. Take a tour through iconic Yellowstone and the Grand Canyon and discover smaller, hidden treasures throughout the country.

We track the history of African Americans around their fix-ins in gorgeous New Orleans.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP12
programme.desc: This moving trend is sweeping states and is taking the food to the people. We get on the bandwagon and taste the food.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP13
programme.desc: Lurking beneath the waters of the northwest is some of the best seafood in the country and in fact, the world. We meet the original custodians of the areas and we taste the food they helped them thrive in this region. Seattle’s seafood scene has grown into one of the best in the world.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP14
programme.desc: We kick off with a Greek restaurant that specialises in seafood. We go north up to Harlem to try a new eatery with a New York foodie and we try the delectable tastes of the world’s first fine-dining restaurant, all here in New York.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Japan - Kyoto
programme.desc: Adam meets a tea master, a Maiko, and a Michelin chef who turns risotto into sushi in the thriving traditional culture of Kyoto.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Japan - Osaka
programme.desc: Adam Liaw explores Japan's high-energy financial centre, Osaka, and finds the world's best fast food, a sumo wrestler turned chef, and soba noodles to die for.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Japan - Kyushu And Shikoku
programme.desc: In Japan's southern islands of Kyushu and Shikoku, Adam Liaw finds a vibrant, warm culture where the cuisine is as fascinating as its people.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Japan - Okinawa
programme.desc: Adam ends his taste tour through Japan with a trip to the island of Okinawa, where he discovers an eclectic cuisine and learns the secret to long life.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2 - Wine Country
programme.desc: Warren is in the Franschhoek Valley, exploring the endless bounty of Boschendal Wine Estate.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2 - Hidden Hermanus
programme.desc: Continuing to listen to his heart, Warren deepens his love of wine by venturing to the lesser known town of Hermanus, where he’ll visit Newton Johnson, the ‘wine farm with a view’.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2 - Wild Kwa-Zulu Natal
programme.desc: The wild northeast coast of South Africa is like nothing you’ve seen. And it’s here Warren will find himself romanced by empty beaches, rugged open oceans, and waterways filled with wild hippopotamus.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2 - Madikwe Safari
programme.desc: In this episode, Warren experiences the abundance of wildlife here, centering his experience around tracking and finding the elusive and endangered African Wild Dog.

programme.title: Bornean Elephants
programme.desc: The documentary takes the perspective of Bornean elephants in Sabah as they traverse through the landscape and show how these gentle giants can coexist with humans amidst different challenges faced.

programme.title: Panama's Animal Highway
programme.desc: Scientists use state-of-the-art technology to battle the conservation dangers threatening the millions of animals that migrate through Panama.

programme.title: Alaska: A Year In The Wild - Winter
programme.desc: The end of winter heralds one of the world's greatest feeding frenzies as large ocean predators target the millions of fish who have found refuge in the Gulf of Alaska.

programme.title: Alaska: A Year In The Wild - Spring
programme.desc: With the arrival of spring, days grow longer and temperatures rise. However, spring in Alaska is short. Animals have just two months to find food and start a family, while avoiding predators.

programme.title: Alaska: A Year In The Wild - Summer
programme.desc: Summer has arrived in Alaska.This sets the scene for one of the world's greatest migrations of the Alaskan salmon run.

programme.title: Alaska: A Year In The Wild - Autumn
programme.desc: Humpback whales return to Alaska's rich feeding grounds and salmon return to spawn in the rivers. The returning salmon however have to negotiate a path past hungry brown bears.

programme.title: Reframed: Marilyn Monroe - Contender
programme.desc: This episode explores the young Norma Jeane. While showing talent and audacity, she turned her back on her difficult childhood and put herself on the radar in Hollywood as ‘Marilyn Monroe’.

programme.title: Reframed: Marilyn Monroe - Siren
programme.desc: This episode explores Marilyn’s defiance about posing nude and how it catapults her to stardom.

programme.title: Million Dollar American Princesses S2 - Queens Of The Screen
programme.desc: Meet three actresses who became real-life princesses. Follow Grace Kelly, Gloria Swanson, and Rita Hayworth on their rise from Hollywood royalty to members of European nobility, which brought unparalleled glamour to the aristocracy.

programme.title: Million Dollar American Princesses S2 - Queens Of Culture
programme.desc: Meet the “Queens of Culture”: three empowered American princesses who blazed trails through the international arts world. See how Winnaretta Singer, Sara Murphy, and Peggy Guggenheim inspired some of the most innovative artists of the 20th century.

programme.title: Million Dollar American Princesses S2 - Queens Of Culture
programme.desc: Meet the “Queens of Culture”: three empowered American princesses who blazed trails through the international arts world. See how Winnaretta Singer, Sara Murphy, and Peggy Guggenheim inspired some of the most innovative artists of the 20th century.

programme.title: Sports Detectives - 100-Point Game Ball
programme.desc: Wilt Chamberlain is the only NBA player to have scored a remarkable 100 points in a game. Investigate what happened to his 100-point ball. Then, examine a controversial Kentucky Derby trophy that may have been falsely identified.

programme.title: Air Warriors - V-22 Osprey
programme.desc: The story of the U.S. Marine's V-22 Osprey is one of transformation. Follow its journey from early failures to building a reputation in battles and on humanitarian rescue efforts.

programme.desc: Explore NASA's development from its founding in 1958 to its preparation for a moon landing.

programme.title: Yorkshire: A Year In The Wild - Spring
programme.desc: Spring comes to the Dales and North York Moors National Parks, the season when the parks' animals must find food, a mate and raise a family.

programme.title: Yorkshire: A Year In The Wild - Summer
programme.desc: Unseasonably cold summer weather causes difficulties for several animals in the Yorkshire Dales and North York Moors, including an injured roe deer and her twins.

programme.title: Yorkshire: A Year In The Wild - Autumn
programme.desc: Autumn is on hold as summer continues, with unexpectedly balmy conditions throwing a life line to the roe deer as they prepare for the winter ahead. For other animals, mating season has arrived, making for a testosterone-fuelled time at Ravenscar Beach.

programme.title: Yorkshire: A Year In The Wild - Winter
programme.desc: Despite its delayed arrival, for the Grey Seals at Ravenscar Beach winter means it is time to give birth. The newborn pups are now on the fast track to adulthood, with just three weeks to gain as much weight as possible before their mothers move on.

programme.title: Impossible Animals - Rainforests
programme.desc: Patrick Ayree introduces us to the Rainforest residents that have pushed their bodies to the limit, revealing some of the world’s most remarkable behaviours and adaptations.

programme.title: Impossible Animals - Coasts
programme.desc: Biologist Patrick Aryee introduces us to the amazing animals that live in the most dynamic landscape on earth – the Coast. From crashing waves, to extreme tides, surviving here takes ingenuity and incredible adaptations.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - The Power In Movement Part 1
programme.desc: Italy's water resue dogs, New Zealand's search and rescue dogs and Australia's team of competitive Alaskan huskies.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - The Mystery Of Healing Part 1
programme.desc: Max is a part of the "Cancer and Bio-detection Dogs" team. Napal is an assistance dog in the USA and Belgium's seizure alert dog, Maybe, sends alerts to his owner before an epileptic seizure.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - Myth & Reality
programme.desc: Dogs in New Zealand can detect human emotions? A pet miniature Schnauzer can predict someone's death? How do dogs really communicate with each other?

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - Crucial Hearing
programme.desc: A Jack Russell Terrier barks when he ears the unique sound of a life threatening occurrence. How are dogs trained to provide assistance? Amos, trained by Hearing Dogs for Deaf People UK helps his owner through some difficult times.

programme.title: Loch Lomond: A Year In The Wild - Spring
programme.desc: It is spring, and migrating ospreys return to the park. Pregnant red deer come down from the mountain tops to the lowlands to calve. On a mountainside, two big cocks fight for the right to mate in a spectacle called a lek.

programme.title: Loch Lomond: A Year In The Wild - Summer
programme.desc: It is now June, and the park is bathed in 17 hours of daylight. With the warm temperatures come rich pickings, but for the newborn the summer months are crucial as they learn to fight, find food and avoid predators.

programme.title: Loch Lomond: A Year In The Wild - Autumn
programme.desc: Autumn is when stags compete to breed, osprey chicks begin a 3000-mile migration to West Africa, salmon return to the rivers where they were born and adders give birth to live young.

programme.title: Loch Lomond: A Year In The Wild - Winter
programme.desc: The winter is mild and wet, which is good news for some but bad news for others. Red deer are forced to higher ground, salmon have gone six months without food, mountain hares turn a conspicuous white, and squirrels kick their own young out of the nest.

programme.desc: Fly alongside 3 WW2 Vets, as they travel to Washington DC to visit a monument built in their honour.

programme.title: Million Dollar American Princesses S2 - Beautiful And Doomed
programme.desc: Witness the tragic tales of Barbara Hutton, Clara Ward, and Kathleen “Kick” Kennedy, women of beauty, wealth and power who married into European nobility, but ended up shunned by society, family, and the happy endings they hoped to achieve.

programme.title: Million Dollar American Princesses S2 - Leading Ladies
programme.desc: Explore the impact three American women had on British fashion, interior design, and even Parliament. Nancy Astor, Nancy Lancaster, and Pauline de Rothschild made the voyage for different reasons, but each shared the desire to stand up and be heard.

programme.title: Queen Elizabeth: A Lifetime Of Service
programme.desc: Elizabeth II: the sixth queen regnant and 63rd sovereign of Britain.

programme.title: Philip: Prince, Husband, Father
programme.desc: As the Queen said, Prince Philip didn’t “take easily to compliments.’ This film lets Prince Philip speak for himself, by drawing on rare archive and audio recordings of the Duke talking about his own life and work.

programme.title: Reframed: Marilyn Monroe - Rebel
programme.desc: This episode explores Marilyn’s determination to become a serious actress and her departure from Twentieth Century Fox to start her own production company.

programme.title: Reframed: Marilyn Monroe - Icon
programme.desc: This episode explores how Marilyn shows her mature talent as an actress and wins a triumphant victory over Twentieth Century Fox shortly before her untimely death.

programme.title: Million Dollar American Princesses S2 - Leading Ladies

programme.title: Queen Elizabeth: A Lifetime Of Service

programme.title: Bombs, Bullets And Fraud
programme.desc: An examination of America's oldest law enforcement agency: The Postal Inspection Service.

programme.title: A-Bombs Over Nevada
programme.desc: Contemporary footage is used to capture the extraordinary period in the 1950s and 60s when hundreds of atomic bombs were dropped over the Nevada Test Site. The race to create bigger and better bombs led scientists to push the limits and turned a sleepy desert town into a theater of the absurd.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP13
programme.desc: Lurking beneath the waters of the northwest is some of the best seafood in the country and in fact, the world. We meet the original custodians of the areas and we taste the food they helped them thrive in this region. Seattle’s seafood scene has grown into one of the best in the world.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP14
programme.desc: We kick off with a Greek restaurant that specialises in seafood. We go north up to Harlem to try a new eatery with a New York foodie and we try the delectable tastes of the world’s first fine-dining restaurant, all here in New York.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP15
programme.desc: Starting in Tampa, at Ulele, a rustic chic restaurant with native Floridian fare, is named after a Native American princess. We then head to Orlando where we experience a mouth watering meal at a plant-based deli cafe, Market On South.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP16
programme.desc: We visit Seattle to try a seafood restaurant with an amazing view of the city, then head to Portland to try some genuine Russian food, with a Portland legend. Then back to Seattle to sample some world cuisine.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S2 - Awarua
programme.desc: Ahi has now been open for over 18 months. Ben Bayly is keen to revisit some of the people who make up the Ahi menu, starting in Awarua.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S2 - Wallaby
programme.desc: Ben continues his South Island trip, visiting the Mackenzie Country, the Canterbury Plains and the Rakaia Gorge.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S2 - Spearfishing
programme.desc: Ben travels to the Marlborough Sounds where he goes spearfishing for Butterfish and checks out the Farmers Market before heading to Nelson to visit New Zealand’s oldest pub.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S2 - Bay Of Plenty
programme.desc: From Avocado, Truffles, Macadamia to Vanilla, the stunning Bay of Plenty is a growers paradise.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2 - Paternoster By The Sea
programme.desc: Warren is heading out of Cape Town into the more quiet coastal area of the Western Cape, and the picturesque town of Paternoster. It’s here he’ll marvel at the seaside village feel and take an e-bike ride along the beach.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2 - Beyond Blyde Canyon
programme.desc: As the final stanza in Warren’s Food Trail of South Africa, he’s back in the bush, a quintessential part of all travel to the rainbow nation.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2 - The Garden Route
programme.desc: A true hidden gem of South Africa, the Garden Route is a 200km stretch of coastal highway known for its beguiling diversity and unparalleled spirit of wilderness.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2 - Cape Town Spice
programme.desc: Warren has arrived into Cape Town. This won’t be your average culinary exploration of a city; Warren has dedicated the entire episode to diving into a specific style of South African cooking known as ‘Cape Malay’.

programme.desc: During a book signing at a medieval castle, Ben must stop Hex from getting his hands on a grimoire that can fuse its user with mythical beasts, creating monstrous hybrids!

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 27: Xingo - EP27
programme.desc: Ben is interested in a marathon of his favourite cartoon show, "Spazz", but when Ben goes Upgrade to get a better signal, the titular Spazz leaps from his animated dimension, bringing chaos with him!

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 28: Drive You Crazy - EP28
programme.desc: After the Rust Bucket breaks down at a Mobile Home Park, Ben discovers they've stumbled on to the last leg of the Cali 10 Hundred, an epic, off-road auto race.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 29: Scared Silly - EP29
programme.desc: When the Rust Bucket runs out of gas on a foggy, East Coast road, Ben, Gwen and Max are forced to stay at a hotel being menaced by Creepy Carl - a local folklore expert, who may actually be a ghost!

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 30: Hole In 10 - EP30
programme.desc: While mini-golfing, Ben is attacked by the Ground Hawgs, a gang of Dr. Animo mutants turned bikers. Ben must turn alien to stop them before they set their sights on the city down the road.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 31: The Beast Inside - EP31
programme.desc: Dr. Animo has made a scary transformation and found a way to release the very dangerous animal nature of humans, including Max's life-long friend!

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 32: Tomorrow Today - EP32
programme.desc: Ben discovers Steam Smythe excavating a "House of the Future" built by Max's childhood idol, in search of a powerful device that will allow him to create devastating weapons for his war on progress.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 33: Max To The Max - EP33
programme.desc: While Ben, Gwen and Max hike to a waterfall, the Bugg Brothers are back with a plan to duplicate Diamondhead, but their cloning ray gun fires on Max instead, multiplying him endlessly.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 34: Zombozo-Land - EP34
programme.desc: Ben, Gwen and Max revisit their favourite amusement park, renovated and rebranded as AdrenaWORLD. Unfortunately, the new management is Zombozo and his trio of new henchmen!

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 35: Don't Laze Me, Bro - EP35
programme.desc: Ben and his arch-enemy, Billy Billions, clash in a duel for supremacy at the world's largest Laser Tag Park, Laser Town when Billy inadvertently ignites a robot rebellion.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 36: Omni-Tricked - EP36
programme.desc: Ben's holiday to Portland is cut short when he discovers an 11th alien while battling a Dr. Animo Mega-Creature and damages his Omnitrix in a fight.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 01: Out To Launch - EP1
programme.desc: While on a visit to Cape Canaveral, the Tennyson Trio attends the inaugural launch of an experimental space plane. When Vilgax commandeers the ship, Ben must stop him from weaponising the shuttle.

programme.title: Blue Beetle
programme.desc: Recent college grad Jaime Reyes returns home full of aspirations for his future, only to find that home is not quite as he left it.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S4 16: Living La Vida Lumpus - EP16
programme.desc: Lumpus does the impossible! He convinces Lazlo that Camp Kidney is actually terrible!

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S4 17: Samson's Mail Fraud - EP17
programme.desc: After getting laughed at by the other campers, Samson lies and tells them that he has a very famous and magical friend.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S4 18: The Haunted Coffee Table - EP18
programme.desc: Slinkman and Raj discover that there's something very creepy about Slinkman's coffee table -- BOO!

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S4 19: Friendward - EP19
programme.desc: Edward attempts the unthinkable -- he tries to make a friend!

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S4 20: Camp Dinkey - EP20
programme.desc: The campers daydream about 'Camp Dinkey,' believing that it is the perfect camp for them.

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S1 36: Ben Boozled - EP36
programme.desc: Flapjack and K'nuckles are tricked into forced rowing on Ben Boozle's ship. Ben makes Flapjack boss but this means he can never leave.

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S1 37: Whale Times - EP37
programme.desc: Bubbie meets a handsome whale suitor. Flapjack gets jealous and then ends up a prisoner on Laundry Island.

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S1 38: Candy Cruise Blues - EP38
programme.desc: Flapjack and K'nuckles are stowaways on the Candy Queen cruise ship. This upsets Poseidon very badly.

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S1 39: Diamonds In The Stuff - EP39
programme.desc: Flapjack is tired of being poor and angry. He decides to go into the sewers of Stormalong to find diamonds.

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S1 40: Tee Hee Tummy Tums - EP40
programme.desc: Flapjack meets a mysterious man who brings combs to children in the night.

programme.desc: Ben's holiday to Portland is cut short when he discovers an 11th alien while battling a Dr. Animo Mega-Creature and damages his Omnitrix in a fight.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S1 64: Pork In The Road - EP64
programme.desc: Squint Eatswood tries to bully his way into being Mayor of the Forest, so Bugs has no choice but to run against him.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S1 65: Squeaks Upon A Star - EP65
programme.desc: Shameless O'Scanty wants Bugs lucky rabbit foot but Bugs is too attached to it to give it up.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S1 66: Mile Hi Grub - EP66
programme.desc: Bigfoot mistakes Squeaks as Bugs' new cat, and goes to every effort to return him to his rightful place.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S1 67: Pole Position - EP67
programme.desc: Bugs and Yosemite Sam attend a rodeo only to have their sidleine shenanigans force them into the ring.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S1 68: Thirst Things First - EP68
programme.desc: Slugsworthy build a new mega-mansion right over Bugs home, so Bugs battles back for the right to his turf.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S1 69: Bugs Of Chance - EP69
programme.desc: Wile has invented a machine that runs purely on walnut oil -- squeaks main foot source!

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S1 70: Bugs For Mayor - EP70
programme.desc: Bugs pops out of his hole to discover he is surrounded by a handful of adversaries.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S1 71: The Lepra-Con - EP71
programme.desc: Squeaks milks it for all its worth when Wile thinks that he has gravely injured squeaks

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S1 72: Squeak Show - EP72
programme.desc: Sir Littlechin pursues a wish-granting unicorn, but fortunately Bugs and Squeaks are there to run interference.

programme.title: Shazam!
programme.desc: A kid has the ability to turn into Shazam, an adult superhero. But he needs to master his powers quickly to fight the deadly forces of evil.

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: Four zoo animals accidentally find themselves enroute to Africa, learning first-hand what life in the wild can be like in this animated family comedy.

programme.desc: A Camping trip to a swamp turns odd when a mysterious sleeping-bag creature joins the activities.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S4 24: The List - EP24
programme.desc: Edward accidentally breaks Lazlo's ankle, and as a punishment is forced to perform Lazlo's long list of good deeds.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S5 01: Camp Complain - EP1
programme.desc: A task force to handle camp complaints is assembled among the campers by Slinkman. But can they separate their duties from the perks of their job?

programme.desc: The annual Acorn Flats 'Wig-out' leaves Almondine pondering the real meaning of 'pretty'.

programme.desc: Flapjack gets stuck in a jar trying to help k'nuckles...

programme.desc: With new Omni-Enhancements in tow, Ben plans on saving a town from a sudden mudslide, but his heroics are short-lived once Vilgax appears to warn him about the Omnitrix's mysterious new alien.

programme.desc: Shameless O'Scanty plots to get Bugs to Ireland so he can get his Lucky Rabbit's Foot on his own turf.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 07: Mayhem In Mascot - EP7
programme.desc: When their attempt to get a photo with every storefront mascot is foiled, Ben and Gwen sneak out to get a snap with a wooden bear totem known as "Yawk" only to find all the mascots have come to life.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 08: Screamcatcher - EP8
programme.desc: When a cavity forces Ben to consult a dentist, his day gets worse when the mean magician Hex uses a dreamcatcher to bring Ben's fears to life and transports them both to a nightmarish dreamscape.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 09: Vote Zombozo - EP9

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 10: Animorphosis - EP10

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 11: High Stress Express - EP11

programme.title: Marcel The Shell With Shoes On
programme.desc: Marcel, an adorable sea snail who lives alone with his grandmother, seeks to find his lost community with the help of a documentary filmmaker.

programme.title: The LEGO Batman Movie
programme.desc: Big changes are brewing in Gotham City and lone vigilante Batman may have to try to work with others to save the city from The Joker.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S3 01: Hello Summer Goodbye Camp - EP1
programme.desc: When the campers return to Leaky Lake, ready for another summer of fun, they learn that Camp Kidney is slated for demolition.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S3 03: Hard Days Samson - EP3
programme.desc: The Squirrel Scouts mistake Samson for their favorite teen idol and hunt him down like he was one of the Beatles.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S3 04: Waiting For Edward - EP4
programme.desc: Slinkman assigns Edward the job of keeping watch over the Dung Beetles and they drive him absolutely crazy.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S3 05: Beans In Toyland - EP5
programme.desc: When Clam wanders into Miss Mucous' yard, Raj and Lazlo are terrified that she is going to bake them into a bean scout cookie!

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S3 06: Where's Clam - EP6
programme.desc: When Raj loses Clam in the forest, he covers up his mistake by convincing Lazlo that Clam has become invisible.

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S2 16: Willy! - EP16
programme.desc: Flap seeks to capture Eight Armed Willy to prove that he's a real adventurer.

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S2 17: Bubbie's Tummy Ache - EP17
programme.desc: Bubbie's got a tummy ache and only Flapjack can solve the problem. Open up and say "Ahhhh"!

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S2 18: Mind The Store Don't Look In The Drawer - EP18
programme.desc: Flap and K'nuckles have to take care of Doctor Barber's office while he's away... and try to keep their eyes off the Doctor's darkest mystery...

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S2 19: Please Retire! - EP19
programme.desc: K'nuckles learns that time has passed him by...

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S2 20: Under The Sea Monster - EP20
programme.desc: Ever heard the saying "Never Cry Wolf"? Well don't cry "Sea Monster" either....

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 17: Bomzobo Lives - EP17
programme.desc: Max takes a driving test to renew his licence, but when a disguised Zombozo hijacks the role of instructor, Ben becomes an alien to stop the evil clown and save their family road trip.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 18: The Sound And The Furry - EP18
programme.desc: As Team Tennyson leaves the Frozen Man Festival, Lord Decibel takes centre stage to threaten the festival-goers, vowing to create an avalanche if his ransom isn't paid.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 19: King Koil - EP19
programme.desc: Ben and Gwen spend the day volunteering at Repto Ranch and come face-to-face with King Koil. They need to overcome their fear of snakes quickly if they are to defeat the slithery baddie.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 20: Reststop Roustabout - EP20
programme.desc: With the Rustbucket stopped on the Midwest roadside, Ben locks himself inside with his tablet as Max and Gwen enjoy the great outdoors, until Team Tennyson is pulled into a wild Jack-a-Lope chase.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 21: That's The Stuff - EP21
programme.desc: While on a tour at a space museum, Ben's excitement multiplies when he learns that some recently discovered "space stuff" is being examined inside the museum's lab.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S1 100: Gorky Pork - EP100

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S1 101: Hard Hat Hare - EP101
programme.desc: Yosemite Sam hires a Bugs Bunny impersonator to cause mayhem around town. All goes according to plan...Bugs' plan, that is.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S1 102: Porky's Duck-Livery Service - EP102

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S1 103: The Wabbit Who Would Be King - EP103

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S2 26: Oh You Animal! - EP26
programme.desc: A social worker deems Bubbie and K'nuckles unfit parents...

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 22: Half-Sies - EP22
programme.desc: During a trip to the Lake of the Ozarks, Ben and Gwen squabble over Ben's "half-birthday" celebration, but when Max gets word of a suspicious rockslide, the cousins must put aside their differences.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 23: Xingo's Back - EP23
programme.desc: Left to entertain himself as Max takes a well-deserved nap, Ben stumbles upon a Xingo arcade game and goes OE-Shock Rock to power it up, but it, unfortunately, receives too much juice.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 24: Bounty Ball - EP24
programme.desc: While Gwen listens to a lecture on the Transcontinental Railroad, Ben sneaks away to the gift shop. When the Bounty Hunters appear and corner Ben, Gwen must use what she learnt to help him escape.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 25: Fear The Fogg - EP25
programme.desc: As Max attempts to get Ben and Gwen to the Four Corners Monument before sunset, an ominous fog bank engulfs the roadway and forces Max to drive at a snail's pace.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 26: The Charm Offensive - EP26
programme.desc: After Ben gets too much publicity for his alien-antics in Fort Knox, a jealous Gwen feels unappreciated and looks to ease her pain with ice cream. She is soon confronted by Charmcaster.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 05: Knight And Duck - EP5
programme.desc: Sir Littlechin believes himself to the be the greatest swordsman in the land, so Daffy the Court Jester decides to challenge him to a duel.

programme.desc: After Squeaks loses a whole bag of nuts playing pool with a cheating Shifty, Bugs decides it's time to teach Shifty a lesson in hustling.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 07: Sam And The Bullet Train - EP7
programme.desc: Yosemite Sam believes no train is too fast to rob, until he goes head to head with a fancy new Bullet Train.

programme.title: The World Heritage Sites in Japan
programme.desc: From natural landscapes to historic architecture representing centuries of cultural development, Japan's World Heritage sites offer a wide range of glimpses into history and the beauty of nature.

programme.title: Time-lapse Japan
programme.desc: The Murakami Kaizoku were seafarers and fighters in the Seto Inland Sea. We explore their history and legacy, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time, Noshima Island.

programme.title: Japan's Top Inventions (28 min.)
programme.desc: The fascinating stories and secrets behind hit Japanese products, plus parts and machines that boast the top share of niche markets. This time: canned bread & automatic dorayaki machines.

programme.title: BOSAI: Science that Can Save Your Life
programme.desc: In September 2014, a volcano erupted without any warning claiming more than 60 lives. Find out why steam-driven phreatic eruptions are hard to forecast and the latest research on volcanic predictions.

programme.desc: We visit Japan's largest and oldest lake, Lake Biwa. A cat leads us to an overlook with a great view of the lake. We meet another cat hiding among the multitude of wares at a Shigaraki ceramics shop.

programme.title: Living as "2nd-Generation" of Religious Devotees
programme.desc: Many children of religious devotees have been affected by their parents' beliefs. Now they are speaking out about the anguish religion has caused them and searching for a way to move on.

programme.title: Walking a Tightrope

programme.title: The First Lady - Punch Perfect
programme.desc: Eleanor forces Franklin’s hand in assisting Jewish refugees fleeing Nazi Germany. While Jerry spends his retirement on the road, Betty seeks out new party companions at home. Despite Barack’s hesitations, Michelle directly speaks out about race.

programme.title: The First Lady - Rift
programme.desc: Eleanor rallies the country as the US enters World War II. After Betty’s addiction spirals, Jerry and her family intervene. Michelle joins Hillary Clinton on the 2016 presidential campaign trail to advocate for the dignity of American women.

programme.title: The First Lady - Victory Dance
programme.desc: Franklin gifts Eleanor the charter for the League of Nations. After rehab, Betty vows to help others with addiction problems. Barack and Michelle prepare to leave the White House, to continue making a difference in the world. Season finale.

programme.title: First Ladies Revealed - The Power Of Style
programme.desc: Dolley Madison. Jackie Kennedy. Nancy Reagan. Join us as we examine their days in the White House and how they defined their position through a mix of diplomacy, glamour, and grit. See how these stylish women left their mark on American history.

programme.title: First Ladies Revealed - Twists Of Fate
programme.desc: Edith Roosevelt, Lady Bird Johnson, and Betty Ford entered the White House under stressful conditions. Whether adding the West Wing or championing women's rights, these three first ladies embraced a job they never expected to hold.

programme.title: First Ladies Revealed - In Times Of War
programme.desc: Join us as we celebrate Mary Todd Lincoln, Eleanor Roosevelt, and Laura Bush–first ladies who served their country at a time when it was most needed, and helped America cope through times of tragedy and trauma.

programme.title: First Ladies Revealed - Trailblazers
programme.desc: Some first ladies are determined to blaze a trail, not just for future first ladies but for women everywhere. Meet two first ladies who stepped out of their husbands' shadows and made a major difference in their own right.

programme.title: The First Lady - That White House
programme.desc: Eleanor, Betty and Michelle enter new political roles. Series premiere.

programme.title: The First Lady - Voices Carry
programme.desc: Eleanor, Betty and Michelle face challenges in their first days in office.

programme.title: The First Lady - Rift
programme.desc: Eleanor rallies the country as the US enters World War II. After Betty’s addiction spirals, Jerry and her family intervene. Michelle joins Hillary Clinton on the 2016 presidential campaign trail to advocate for the dignity of American women.

programme.title: The First Lady - Victory Dance
programme.desc: Franklin gifts Eleanor the charter for the League of Nations. After rehab, Betty vows to help others with addiction problems. Barack and Michelle prepare to leave the White House, to continue making a difference in the world. Season finale.

programme.title: First Ladies Revealed - The Power Of Style
programme.desc: Dolley Madison. Jackie Kennedy. Nancy Reagan. Join us as we examine their days in the White House and how they defined their position through a mix of diplomacy, glamour, and grit. See how these stylish women left their mark on American history.

programme.title: First Ladies Revealed - In Times Of War

programme.title: First Ladies Revealed - Trailblazers
programme.desc: Some first ladies are determined to blaze a trail, not just for future first ladies but for women everywhere. Meet two first ladies who stepped out of their husbands' shadows and made a major difference in their own right.

programme.desc: Magnum and Higgins weigh the risks of pursuing a relationship. Rick juggles being a new father and running La Mariana. Katsumoto tries to figure out his next move.

programme.title: Magnum Pi ('18) S5 - The Breaking Point
programme.desc: Magnum and Higgins go undercover as lifeguards in order to solve a murder. Jin Jeong wins a storage unit auction and enlists the help of Rick and TC upon finding a stolen military medal.

programme.title: Magnum Pi ('18) S5 - Number One With A Bullet
programme.desc: Katsumoto takes a job providing security for a chart-topping K-Pop star. Higgins and Rick find themselves in peril while trying to help Rick’s friend.

programme.title: Magnum Pi ('18) S5 - Nsfw
programme.desc: Magnum and Higgins search for a CEO who has mysteriously vanished. Rick braces for a visit from his wild-child little sister, Ruthie.

programme.title: Magnum Pi ('18) S5 - Welcome To Paradise, Now Die!
programme.desc: Magnum recruits Katsumoto to help find a missing tourist. Higgins and Kumu attempt to solve the murder of a beloved dog. Rick enlists the aid of TC after he accidentally loses Magnum’s pet mouse, Roberto II.

programme.title: Magnum Pi ('18) S5 - Dead Ringer
programme.desc: Katsumoto’s hearing date has arrived and he will learn if his career in law enforcement is over for good or not. Magnum and Higgins are hired to investigate a man their client believes committed murder. Rick’s suspicions grow on their relationship.

programme.title: Magnum Pi ('18) S5 - Birthright
programme.desc: Magnum and Higgins investigate the robbery of an elderly man suffering from Alzheimer’s. The ohana tries to help TC overcome a past trauma.

programme.title: Magnum Pi ('18) S5 - Dark Skies
programme.desc: Magnum and Rick make a shocking discovery in the Capt. Greene case. Higgins and TC head to Maui to help an eccentric billionaire find the owner of a pesky drone that has been harassing him. Shammy helps Kumu after an incident occurs at La Mariana.

programme.title: Magnum Pi ('18) S5 - Out Of Sight, Out Of Mind
programme.desc: Magnum and Higgins take on a case that sends Higgins inside a psychiatric hospital. Katsumoto and his son, Dennis, head to the mainland to look at colleges, but their trip takes a harrowing turn when a run-in with a local turns ugly.

programme.title: Magnum Pi ('18) S5 - Charlie Foxtrot
programme.desc: An armed hit team lays siege on Robin’s Nest. TC is badly injured while Rick fights for his life.

programme.title: Magnum Pi ('18) S5 - Hit And Run
programme.desc: Magnum and Higgins go to work for a dangerous and controversial client. Kumu and Shammy help move TC to a veterans’ rehab facility. Rick flirts with a woman who works at the marina.

programme.title: Magnum Pi ('18) S5 - Three Bridges
programme.desc: Magnum and Higgins try to help Zhao, a close friend of Kumu, recover her life savings that was all lost to a scammer. TC becomes increasingly frustrated at the lack of progress in his recovery and pushes everyone away.

programme.title: Magnum Pi ('18) S5 - Appetite For Danger
programme.desc: Magnum and Higgins enlist Katsumoto to go undercover when a chef at a high-end restaurant goes missing. Kumu works with Cade at the Cultural Center, confronting one of America’s darker chapters – the internment of Japanese Americans in the wake of Pearl Harbor.

programme.title: Magnum Pi ('18) S5 - Night Has A Thousand Eyes
programme.desc: Magnum and Rick race to find a missing witness who can exonerate an innocent man accused of murder. TC tries to repair his relationship with Mahina after being released from the VA.
